label: % Low Income Students
description: Percentage of students from low-income households

label: % English Learner Students
description: Percentage of students classified as English Learners

label: % IEP Students
description: Percentage of students with Individualized Education Programs

label: % White Students
description: Percentage of students identifying as White

label: % Black Students
description: Percentage of students identifying as Black/African American

label: % Hispanic Students
description: Percentage of students identifying as Hispanic/Latino

label: % Asian Students
description: Percentage of students identifying as Asian

label: Student Mobility Rate
description: Rate of students transferring in or out during the year

label: High School Dropout Rate
description: Total dropout rate for high school students

label: Teacher Retention Rate
description: Percentage of teachers returning from prior year

label: In-School Suspension Rate
description: Number or rate of in-school suspensions
